posts.post_content: Needed a smaller mana cost, needed a cheaper activated ability, needed better toughness to keep it out of [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt) and [Lightning Helix](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Helix) range. It didn't live up to its fullest potential which is a real dissapointment.
posts.html:
Needed a smaller mana cost, needed a cheaper activated ability, needed better toughness to keep it out of Lightning Bolt and Lightning Helix range. It didn't live up to its fullest potential which is a real dissapointment.

Posted By: SavageBrain89 (2/4/2010 3:31:10 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
either the activation cost - or even better: the mana cost - could have been slightly lower. double-black wasn't really necessary for this card, also in terms of flavor since sacrificing doesn't really belong to any color.  
![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) would have done as well.

posts.post_content: All in all it's just far too expensive manawise, both the ability and the casting cost. And the p/t is too low as well. On the other hand I still have him in some commander/edh decks because he can get rid of regenerating and especially indestructible creatures, and help my commander/general to punch through for lethal damage. 3/5
